rules_text:
This creature can’t be blocked by more than one creature.
Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +1/+0 for each kind of counter among permanents you control.

OG_3:
Whenever MV4 Truffleyard Hog attacks, if there are three or more different kinds of counters among permanents you control, it gets +3/+0 until end of turn and can’t be blocked by more than one creature this turn.

OG_2:
Whenever MV4 Truffleyard Hog attacks, if there are three or more different kinds of counters among permanents you control, draw a card.




OG_1:
When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile an artifact card from your graveyard. If you do, draw a card.
